Html: Any info about properly configuring the two plugins?  When I tried I got an Input String format error...I am wondering if it is because I left a few fields like Domain blank.

The branch with plugins is completely experimental and might go away or change at anytime so use it at your own risk.  :)

That said, there shouldn't be any secret to getting it configured.  If you don't set a field the plugin doesn't try to set the object's property so you shouldn't get any errors (unless there's a bug).  Leaving the domain field blank is fine.  For my site I just set the username and password and from address and host fields.  If you can debug and step through where the error happens and provide some more info I might be able to help.
